author: ate
msg: User no longer contains/provides access to its Subject as it used in many cases
For an authenticated user, the Subject contains a UserSubjectPrincipal which wraps and provides access to both the User and its Subject

author: ate
msg: - adding support for creating non-mapped Role and Group
- dropped setEnabled method, replaced with update<T> method

author: ate
msg: more core interfaces and base implementation fixes and improvements
